description:
A time tracker and timesheet app that lets you track work hours across projects.


- Auto-save preferences
- Loading more projects in project picker improved.
- Reminders - Improving validation to consider both time and date.
- (Fix) The client name is not displayed in the Time entry details window.
- (Fix) Auto tracker settings - Start time cannot be greater than Stop time.
- (Fix) Crashes after PC wakes up from sleep
